answers.answer: Hi.....from others that had a BB issue they found to stop eating several hours b4 going to bed is helpful...and it also helps with the gerd .Hiatal hernia's as well as IBS can attribute to a bloated issue.Diet is important with diabetes and and gerd....u need to also avoid foods that will irritate ur reflux.....Please see the Health Pages for a list of foods to avoid and lifestyle changes to help u with this issue.I will see if I can find the thread from the other member on BB."selma"

question: This year, I had an endoscopy, colonoscopy, blood test for celiac - all tested and NOTHING.  So, I do not understand why I feel nauseous in the morning, get heartburn and a bloated feeling.  At times,  I feel I will not make it through the day.  What can I do to relieve the symptoms?  I have been a diabetic for 35 years - Type 1.  I am 60 yers old with a lovely frame - so overweight is not the issue.And what's more - I am having unpleasant bad breath - what can be done to alleviate this - it certainly doesn' make me a good candidate for "kissing" anyone...what can I do?
title: Nausea, sleeplessness, heartburn, diabetes, bad breath
